Verify a Certificate

To verify the status of a professionals certification, enter their unique Certificate ID below.

Security Notice: If a professional is unwilling or unable to provide a Certificate ID, exercise extreme caution. All certified professionals are equipped with an ID for public verification.

Interpreting Results:

  • No Professional Found: The ID is either expired or was never issued.
  • Name Mismatch: If the name provided doesn't match our records, the certificate is likely fraudulent.
Please be advised: The CERTIFIED CRYPTOCURRENCY TRADER (CCT) exclusively provides certifications related to cryptocurrency. Individuals claiming investment expertise without these credentials may be attempting to mislead you. Remain vigilant.

Welcome to the Blockchain Council, a collective of forward-thinking Blockchain and Deep Tech enthusiasts dedicated to advancing research, development, and practical applications of Blockchain, AI, and Web3 technologies. Our mission is to foster a collaborative environment where experts from diverse disciplines share their knowledge and promote varied use cases for a technologically advanced world.
Blockchain Council is a private de-facto organization of experts and enthusiasts championing advancements in Blockchain, AI, and Web3 Technologies. To enhance our community’s learning, we conduct frequent webinars, training sessions, seminars, and events and offer certification programs.
